With flexible borrowing extensions, exclusive access to newly released books, and personalised recommendations, Libranova is here to inspire and support your reading journey. accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Our application is designed to be accessible for everyone, regardless of device or ability.
accessibility.keyboard_desc: The application is fully usable without a mouse. All interactive components can be accessed in a logical sequence using the Tab key, with visible focus indicators for clarity. Skip links are implemented to allow quick navigation to main content, and ARIA attributes ensure compatibility with assistive technologies.
accessibility.responsive: Optimised for mobile, tablet, and desktop
accessibility.responsive_desc: The interface adapts dynamically to different screen sizes using responsive design techniques, including fluid layouts, CSS media queries, and scalable elements. This ensures a consistent and accessible experience on smartphones, tablets, laptops, and desktop computers.
accessibility.colors_desc: Colours have been selected to meet WCAG 2.1 AA contrast standards, improving readability for users with visual impairments. Alternative text and colour-independent cues are used to ensure important information is not conveyed by colour alone.
accessibility.clarity_desc: The application uses semantic HTML5 elements, descriptive headings, and ARIA landmarks to give a clear structure. Labels and instructions are written in plain language, making navigation straightforward for all users, including those with cognitive disabilities.
accessibility.multilang: Available in multiple languages (English and German)
accessibility.multilang_desc: All user-facing text is available in both English and German. Users can switch languages instantly via a language selector, with text dynamically reloaded without requiring a page refresh.
